snippet.title: Last Expedition | Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
The first thing we learned about Aura is that it's beautiful. The second thing we learned is that its beauty is dangerous. Very dangerous.

It wasn't always like that. But something is changing the planet - and it's up to us to find out what that is... before it's too late.

https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Last-Expedition

🎮 ABOUT GALA GAMES 🎮

Gala Games is changing the game by adding empowerment through ownership and real rewards. On the Gala Games platform you'll find a rapidly growing selection of awesome games... There's something for everyone, so make time to play!

Create a free account:
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Gala-Games

🎙 GALA MUSIC 🎙
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Gala-Music

📽 GALA FILM 📽
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Gala-Film

🐦SOCIALS 🐦

X
https://twitter.com/GoGalaGames

Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/GoGalaGames

Instagram
https://www.instagram.com/gogalagames/

Reddit
https://www.reddit.com/r/GalaGames/

✍ BLOG ✍
https://blog.gala.games/

🤝COMMUNITIES 🤝

Gala Games community:
https://discord.gg/JFxuPmxz5x

Gala Music community:
https://gomusic.gala.com/gyt-music-discord

Gala Film community:
https://gofilm.gala.com/gyt-film-discord

VOX community:
https://discord.gg/collectvox

📈 SECONDARY ITEM MARKET 📈
https://opensea.io/category/galagames

⛓ GALACHAIN ⛓
Our games-first and developer-friendly L1 blockchain is ready for your project. Start empowering your users today. Learn more:
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-GalaChain

❓ SUPPORT ❓
https://support.gala.games/

🎮OUR GAMES 🎮

⏳Eternal Paradox ⏳
Get lost in the paradox of this unique hybrid of 4X and RPG battling, where time repeats itself every 49 days in a massive competition.
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Eternal-Paradox

🏟 Champions Arena 🏟
Collect NFT Champions with unique skills and strategies in this epic mobile-first RPG battle adventure!
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Champions-Arena

🧟The Walking Dead: Empires 🧟
In the world of AMC's The Walking Dead, players collect scraps where they can, attempting to survive walkers and hostile neighbors alike. LIVE NOW - Public Dev Build!
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-The-Walking-Dead-Empires

🐲 Dragon Strike: Puzzle RPG 🐲
Collect and battle your way to glory in this addictive puzzle RPG battler created by Ember Entertainment.
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Dragon-Strike-Puzzle-RPG

♠PokerGO Play ♠
Enjoy a casual and fun poker experience where players have a chance to win $GALA in each week's Sweepstakes!
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-PokerGO-Play

🕸Spider Tanks 🕸
Embrace the metal-on-metal mayhem in this tank brawler, where even free players can earn VP rewards!
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Spider-Tanks

🧑‍🌾Common Ground World 🧑‍🌾
This is Gala Games' flagship project, a delightful farming sim game with the power to save the world.
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Common-Ground-World

🦸Superior 🦸
The super heroes have gone mad and destroyed the world. Maybe you should try to stop them by stealing their powers and giving them a taste of their own medicine. Co-op third person shooter.
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Superior

🤠GRIT 🤠
It's a battle royale in the Wild West with GRIT. Parachute in, and try to stay alive while the calamity forces you closer and closer to your enemies.
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Grit

😺Meow Match 😺
Collect and match adorable kitties in this addictive match-3 game for your favorite mobile device.
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Meow-Match

⚔Legends Reborn ⚔
This competitive card game lets players collect monsters and spells, then go head to head with summoners from all over the world. Coming Soon.
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Legends-Reborn
 
🧝Mirandus 🧝
The player-empowering MMORPG is still in development, but has already been hailed as the ultimate fantasy simulator game.
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Mirandus

🛰Battlestar Galactica Eternity 🛰
Teaming up with NBC Universal's Battlestar Galactica, this in-development 4X is sure to be a smash hit.
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Battlestar-Galactica-Eternity

🔭Last Expedition 🔭
This breathtaking and fast-paced extraction co-op FPS is not for the faint of heart. Join Early Access now.
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Last-Expedition

💸Legacy 💸
The highly anticipated business sim from Peter Molyneux and 22cans is live now, so start building your Legacy!
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Legacy

🚀Echoes of Empire 🚀
This stunning 4X adventure in space is planning to launch soon, powered by planetary ownership and real rewards.
https://gogames.gala.com/evd-Echoes-of-Empire

Welcome to the future of gaming!

#gaming #galagames #gamers
